- Exterior wood privacy fence; vertical pickets, likely pressure-treated pine.  
- Weathered gray finish with surface checks and small splits in several boards.  
- Small gaps between adjacent boards; slight bowing on a couple of boards.  
- Fasteners along bottom rail show mild rust; verify and reseat/replace as needed.  
- Maintenance recommended: clean and seal/stain; inspect for rot at ends and replace damaged boards.
